column4: Hi. My hidden TrueCrypt volume is damaged and I don't know how to recover some data. Please, urgent help!
try runnnig spinrite6.0 on it? might help
i think i wrote som data on outer volume
And now it won't mount on linux
so u overwrote the hidden volume a bit?
it says  mount: you must specify the filesystem type
is it on linux or on windows partition?
it's on NTFS. but i'm using linux now
tell me please, step by step...
do u know which partition u need to mount to get it working?
so i've mounted my hidden volume now, checking at Filesystem -> Do not mount. It shows the capacity of volume, algorithms used but can't access it
sorry couldnt reproduce your problem :( Just ask again, hopefully someone else can help
thanks a lot anyway. hope i'll get it in the end
